378337752875819000,Fri Sep 13 02:02:04 +0000 2013,What a fantastic night! We raised ¬£100,000 pounds which will all go towards eradicating curable blindness in india. Heartfelt gratitude.
377336766501769200,Tue Sep 10 07:44:30 +0000 2013,The proceeds all go towards helping the 150 million blind people in india to see again. 80% of these cases are curable.
377336138157281300,Tue Sep 10 07:42:00 +0000 2013,Off to London for the charity auction dinner day after...our first as a family for the pataudi trust. I hope we raise lots of funds!
